scripts.preinstall: if [ -d ".git" ]; then git submodule foreach git pull origin master; fi;
scripts.postinstall: if [ -d ".git" ]; then CWD=$(pwd)/tmp/test-root; NODE_ENV=test node main.server.js coverage --reporter=html-cov | sed "s|$CWD/build/|$CWD/|g" | sed "s|$CWD/|/|g" > project/stats/coverage.html; rm -rf tmp/test-root; wget `node_modules/sloc/bin/sloc --format json core | node project/tools/sloc.js` -O project/stats/comments.badge.png; wget http://img.shields.io/codeclimate/github/marcominetti/ljve.io.png?style=flat -O project/stats/climate.badge.png; wget http://img.shields.io/codeclimate/coverage/github/marcominetti/ljve.io.png?style=flat -O project/stats/coverage.badge.png; wget http://img.shields.io/travis/marcominetti/ljve.io.png?style=flat -O project/stats/build.badge.png; fi;
scripts.test: if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then CWD=$(pwd)/tmp/test-root; NODE_ENV=test node main.server.js coverage --reporter=mocha-lcov-reporter | sed "s|SF:$CWD/build/|SF:$CWD/|g" > project/stats/coverage.lcov; cp -r tmp/test-root/build/* tmp/test-root/; cat project/stats/coverage.lcov | CODECLIMATE_REPO_TOKEN=e0cf2f4af8c73634b29d8342a180ae402252479a3bc4f6c1dcf6f31b184525f3 node_modules/codeclimate-test-reporter/bin/codeclimate.js; rm -rf tmp/test-root; fi; NODE_ENV=test node main.server.js test;
